SELECT rownum, FINISHEDGOODS_ID, FINISHEDGOODS_NAME, FINISHEDGOODS_QUANTITY, FINISHEDGOODS_PRICE, QUANTITY_UNITS, FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(FINISHEDGOODS SYS_C0012608)*/ rownum rn, FINISHEDGOODS_ID, FINISHEDGOODS_NAME, FINISHEDGOODS_QUANTITY, FINISHEDGOODS_PRICE, QUANTITY_UNITS, FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS FROM FINISHEDGOODS WHERE FINISHEDGOODS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{goods.finishedgoods_name}||'%'
AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=0
AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=1
AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=2
AND rownum <= #{paging.pageNum}*#{paging.pageSize}) WHERE rn > (#{paging.pageNum}-1)*#{paging.pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM FINISHEDGOODS WHERE FINISHEDGOODS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{goods.finishedgoods_name}||'%'
AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=0
AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=1
AND FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=2
SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(FINISHEDGOODS SYS_C0012608)*/FINISHEDGOODS_NAME FROM FINISHEDGOODS WHERE FINISHEDGOODS_STATUS=0
